text: Moshoeshoe II (2 May 1938 â€“ 15 January 1996), previously known as Constantine Bereng Seeiso, was the paramount chief of Lesotho. He was king of Lesotho from 1966 until his exile in 1990, and from 1995 until his death in 1996. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:1996 deaths Category:Road accident deaths Category:Kings of Lesotho
title: Moshoeshoe II of Lesotho
